Name: Communication Type Classification
Description: The AI Classification of the communication type
Options: Newsletter (newsletter); Promotional Offer (promotional_offer); Product or Feature Announcement (product_feature_announcement); Educational (educational); Event Invitation or Reminder (event_invitation_reminder); Account Management (account_management); Initial Engagement (initial_engagement); Feedback (feedback); Other (other)

Name: Personalisation Level Classification
Description: The AI Classification of the level of personalisation
Options: Generic (generic); Segment targeted (segment_targeted); Industry/role specific (industry_role_specific); Individually personalised (individually_personalised); undetermined

Name: Subject line and Preview Text Classification
Description: The AI Classification of the subject line and preview text of the email
Options: Question Format (question_format); Direct Statement (direct_statement); Teaser/Curiosity (teaser_curiosity); Benefit Focused (benefit_focused); Urgent/Time-sensitive (urgent_time_sensitive); Personalized (personalized); Promotional (promotional); News/Announcement (news_announcement); Other (other)

Name: Bounce rate
Description: The percentage of emails that didn't get delivered.

Name: Bounces
Description: The number of emails that didn't get delivered.

Name: Click rate
Description: The percentage of recipients who clicked a CTA, out of those who received your email.

Name: Clicks
Description: The number of recipients who clicked a CTA.

Name: Click-through rate
Description: The percentage of recipients who clicked a CTA, out of those who opened your email.

Name: Delivered
Description: The number of emails that got delivered.

Name: Delivery rate
Description: The percentage of emails that got delivered.

Name: Hard bounces
Description: The number of emails that couldn’t be delivered for permanent reasons.

Name: Hard bounce rate
Description: The percentage of emails that couldn’t be delivered for permanent reasons.

Name: Not sent
Description: The number of recipients that didn't get sent the email. This is to protect your sending reputation.

Name: Open rate
Description: The percentage of recipients who opened the email.

Name: Opens
Description: The number of recipients who opened the email.

Name: Replies
Description: The number of replies the email received.

Name: Reply rate
Description: The percentage of recipients who replied to the email.

Name: Sent
Description: The number of emails sent.

Name: Soft bounces
Description: The number of emails that couldn’t be delivered for temporary reasons.

Name: Soft bounce rate
Description: The percentage of emails that couldn’t be delivered for temporary reasons.

Name: Spam reports
Description: The number of recipients that reported your emails as spam.

Name: Spam report rate
Description: The percentage of recipients that reported your emails as spam.

Name: Unsubscribe rate
Description: The percentage of recipients who clicked 'unsubscribe'.

Name: Unsubscribes
Description: The number of recipients who clicked 'unsubscribe'.

Name: Approval request status
Description: This shows if email approval is approved, pending, cancelled, or not requested

Name: Archived
Description: This shows if the email has been archived.

Name: Author email
Description: The user who published the email. For unpublished emails, it shows the user who created the email.

Name: Author name
Description: The user who published the email. For unpublished emails, it shows the user who created the email.

Name: Campaign name
Description: The campaign name

Name: Created date
Description: The date and time at which the email was created.

Name: Created by user ID
Description: The user who created this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Object create date/time
Description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: Template type
Description: The template used to create the email ('design manager' or 'drag and drop').

Name: Folder Id
Description: This value represents the folder Id of a certain folder that the email was moved too.

Name: From address
Description: The email address recipients will see.

Name: From name
Description: The name recipients will see.

Name: Generated by AI
Description: The content was fully generated by AI and was not edited by a human.
Options: Image (IMAGE); Main content (MAIN_CONTENT); Subject line (SUBJECT_LINE); Preview text (PREVIEW_TEXT); Translated (AUTO_TRANSLATION); Email generation (EMAIL_GENERATOR)

Name: Co-created with AI
Description: The content was generated by AI and then edited by a human.
Options: Image (IMAGE); Main content (MAIN_CONTENT); Subject line (SUBJECT_LINE); Preview text (PREVIEW_TEXT); Template (TEMPLATE); Email generation (EMAIL_GENERATOR)

Name: Object last modified date/time
Description: Most recent timestamp of any property update for this object. This includes HubSpot internal properties, which can be visible or hidden. This property is updated automatically.

Name: Created by user
Description: Please use hs_created_by_user_id instead.

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Email name
Description: The name of the marketing email.
Usages: Object requirement (1); Report (1); Dataset (1); Sales view (12)

Name: Record ID
Description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record source detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source
Description: How this record was created.

Name: Marketing email ID
Description: The email's unique ID.

Name: Preview key
Description: The preview key for the email

Name: Publish/send date
Description: This shows when regular emails were first sent, and when scheduled emails will be sent. For automated/blog/RSS/follow-up emails, it shows when the email was last published.

Name: Publish status
Description: This shows if an email is published, scheduled or draft.

Name: Published at date
Description: This shows when someone clicked 'Send', 'Schedule' or 'Publish' after creating an email in the editor page.

Name: Published by email
Description: The email address of the user who published the email.

Name: Published by
Description: The user who published the email.

Name: Send frequency
Description: The scheduled timing for sending blog/RSS emails (weekly, daily, monthly).

Name: Email state
Description: The state of the Marketing Email.
Options: Automated (AUTOMATED) [READ-ONLY]; Automated AB Variant (AUTOMATED_AB_VARIANT) [READ-ONLY]; Automated Draft (AUTOMATED_DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; Automated Draft AB (AUTOMATED_DRAFT_AB) [READ-ONLY]; Automated Draft AB Variant (AUTOMATED_DRAFT_ABVARIANT) [READ-ONLY]; Automated Loser AB Variant (AUTOMATED_LOSER_ABVARIANT) [READ-ONLY]; Automated Sending (AUTOMATED_SENDING) [READ-ONLY]; Automated for Form (AUTOMATED_FOR_FORM) [READ-ONLY]; Automated for Form Buffer (AUTOMATED_FOR_FORM_BUFFER) [READ-ONLY]; Automated for Form Draft (AUTOMATED_FOR_FORM_DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; Automated for Form Legacy (AUTOMATED_FOR_FORM_LEGACY) [READ-ONLY]; Blog Email Draft (BLOG_EMAIL_DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; Blog Email Published (BLOG_EMAIL_PUBLISHED) [READ-ONLY]; Draft (DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; Draft AB (DRAFT_AB) [READ-ONLY]; Draft AB Variant (DRAFT_AB_VARIANT) [READ-ONLY]; Error (ERROR) [READ-ONLY]; Loser AB Variant (LOSER_AB_VARIANT) [READ-ONLY]; Pre Processing (PRE_PROCESSING) [READ-ONLY]; Processing (PROCESSING) [READ-ONLY]; Published AB (PUBLISHED_AB) [READ-ONLY]; Published AB Variant (PUBLISHED_AB_VARIANT) [READ-ONLY]; Published Automated AB (AUTOMATED_AB) [READ-ONLY]; Published or Scheduled (PUBLISHED_OR_SCHEDULED) [READ-ONLY]; RSS to Email Draft (RSS_TO_EMAIL_DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; RSS to Email Scheduled (RSS_TO_EMAIL_PUBLISHED) [READ-ONLY]; Scheduled (SCHEDULED) [READ-ONLY]; Scheduled AB (SCHEDULED_AB) [READ-ONLY]; Scheduled or Published (SCHEDULED_OR_PUBLISHED) [READ-ONLY]; Sent (PUBLISHED) [READ-ONLY]

Name: Subject line
Description: This provides the email's subject line copy.

Name: Subscription
Description: The subscription associated with the email.

Name: Transactional email
Description: Indicates whether the email is transactional or not.

Name: Email type
Description: Specifies the type of the email.
Options: Regular (BATCH_EMAIL); Automated (AUTOMATED_EMAIL); Time zone (LOCALTIME_EMAIL); Regular A/B (AB_EMAIL); Automated A/B (AUTOMATED_AB_EMAIL); Blog (BLOG_EMAIL); Blog child (BLOG_EMAIL_CHILD); RSS (RSS_EMAIL); RSS child (RSS_EMAIL_CHILD); Follow-up (FOLLOWUP_EMAIL); Single send API (SINGLE_SEND_API); Marketing single send API (MARKETING_SINGLE_SEND_API); Feedback CES (FEEDBACK_CES_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Feedback custom (FEEDBACK_CUSTOM_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Feedback custom survey (FEEDBACK_CUSTOM_SURVEY_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Feedback NPS (FEEDBACK_NPS_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Leadflow (LEADFLOW_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Optin (OPTIN_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Optin followup (OPTIN_FOLLOWUP_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Resubscribe (RESUBSCRIBE_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; SMTP token (SMTP_TOKEN); Ticket (TICKET_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Membership password reset (MEMBERSHIP_PASSWORD_RESET_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Membership password saved (MEMBERSHIP_PASSWORD_SAVED_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Membership registration (MEMBERSHIP_REGISTRATION_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Membership registration follow up (MEMBERSHIP_FOLLOW_UP_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Membership email verification (MEMBERSHIP_VERIFICATION_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Membership passwordless auth (MEMBERSHIP_PASSWORDLESS_AUTH_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]; Manage Preferences (MANAGE_PREFERENCES_EMAIL) [HIDDEN]

Name: Last updated at
Description: The date and time which the email was last updated.

Name: Updated by user ID
Description: The user who last updated this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner assigned date
Description: The most recent timestamp of when an owner was assigned to this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner
Description: The owner of the object.

Name: Talking Points
Options: America Prays 250; NRB 2026; PRAY Science (Pray Science)
